name: HTML Extract
natural_language_description: 这是 HTML Extract 节点。主要用于: Extracts data from HTML

sourceData.name: sourceData
sourceData.description: If HTML should be read from binary or JSON data
sourceData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Data | 作用: If HTML should be read from binary or JSON data | 默认值: json

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the JSON property in which the HTML to extract the data from can be found. The property can either contain a string or an array of strings.
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Property | 作用: Name of the JSON property in which the HTML to extract the data from can be found. The property can either contain a string or an array of strings. | 默认值: data | (必填项)

extractionValues.name: extractionValues
extractionValues.natural_language_description: 参数名: Extraction Values | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: trimValues (值: None) - Whether to remove automatically all spaces and newlines from the beginning and end of the values
